artist: Aleksandr Mikhailovich Rodchenko; Author: Kornely Liutsianovich Zelinksy; Author: Ilia Lvovich Selvinsky; Publisher: Gosizdat

text: An artist, designer and photographer, Alexander Rodchenko ranks among the most influential figures of the Russian Constructivist movement post-1917. He designed interiors, stage sets, fashions, costumes, textiles, posters and book covers. Rodchenko was responsible for the cover of Exchange of All or All Change, which was the first anthology of Constructivist literature. His innovative typography boldly and succinctly conveyed the spirit of the revolutionary essays and poems contributed to this publication by the constructor literati.
title: All Change
